comment: 01/11/2020 Succhi’s wedding! Pretty smooth, still has some oak and pear flavor good
Such an incredible bottle for the price! A 25yr sherry cask single malt for $130?!

Crazy clean with a nice long finish. The nose is strong with sherry, green apples, and honey. My only nit is that the space between front and back is almost too smooth. It’s a limited release so if you see it, get it!
